OOC: Sorry I didn't finish my last post!  I always do that!

::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Orchestra/Composer::

        Triggerhappy sent out Blowpipe to fight.  Blowpipe fired his lasers
at Vehement.  Triggerhappy looked at the Brotherhood.

        "Hey, I never noticed those creeps!" He said to himself.

         Triggerhappy decided to help MM.  He ran in front of HotRod(or the
opposite side of which MM is lunging at HR) and Triggerhappy, without seeing
what MM was doing, lunged at HR in an attempt to bodycheck him.  (Hmm, if HR
was to move out of the way, MM and TH could seriously hurt eachother-hint,
hint RoboRick)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
          Skullgrin is hit by blasts and charges, but the blasts and stuff
aren't enough to penetrate his tank armor.

           "HAHA!!!" He yells, firing at Sun Crusher, his new target.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
           Orchestra nodded.

            "I really thought I was gonna die," Orchestra answered,
remembering when one of the Voc executioners stared in his eyes, and sent
fear into his thinking unit.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
         Composer stands back and watches.

          "Let's see what these suckers can do," He said, ready for the
tests and crap.
